title: Massive Attack - Angel  HD 1080p
author: kevin l.s
comment: Still one of the scariest album covers I've ever seen...

First fell in love with the song in 1998, where it's one of Adidas advertisement for World Cup '98 France, featuring a famous footballer shooting a penalty in black n white,in slooow-motion. Then picked it up again somewhere in 2002 watching Brad Pitt being restrained in slooow-motion in the movie 'Snatch'. Then in 2009, caught Dennis Quaid in a shooting incident in the Sahara desert in the movie "Flight of the Phoenix",in slooow-motion too. Finally, I HAD to find out which Artist is responsible for this mesmerizing song. It's my playlist now. (Love the 8D version too!)
Greatest electronic track I've ever heard. But my knowledge in electronic music is still not more than moderate.
You can barely hear the little background noises and knocks and things on low quality versions of this. This is brilliant at high settings, trust me.
Massive attack is the most powerful hallucinogenic drug... but it's free, legal and safe.
description: Extract from mezzanine one of best Massive Attack Album.
